38a5('bum): mi dmigs na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de
38a6('bum): bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mig gi
38a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de
38b1('bum): bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang
38b2('bum): mi dmigs na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs
38b3('bum): te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/ lce'i 'dus
38b4('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lus kyi
38b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin
38b6('bum): nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang mi
38b7('bum): dmigs na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/ mig gi 'dus te
39a1('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mig gi
39a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te
39a3('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
39a4('bum): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i
39a5('bum): de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta
39a6('bum): dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi
39a7('bum): dmigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga
39b1('bum): la 'gyur/ de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te
39b2('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yid kyi 'dus te reg
39b3('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang
39b4('bum): mi dmigs na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sa'i khams mi dmigs/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
39b5('bum): mi dmigs te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chu'i khams mi dmigs/ chu'i khams kyi de
39b6('bum): bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la me'i khams mi dmigs/ me'i khams
39b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ me'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rlung gi khams mi dmigs/ rlung
40a1('bum): gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/
40a2('bum): de la nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin
40a3('bum): nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa'i
40a4('bum): khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ma rig pa mi dmigs/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin
40a5('bum): nyid mi dmigs te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'du byed mi dmigs/ 'du byed kyi de
40a6('bum): bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ 'du byed nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par shes pa mi dmigs rnam
40a7('bum): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ming
40b1('bum): dang gzugs mi dmigs/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par
40b2('bum): ga la 'gyur/ de la skye mched drug mi dmigs/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid
40b3('bum): lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la reg pa mi dmigs/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ reg pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs
40b4('bum): par ga la 'gyur/ de la tshor ba mi dmigs/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/
40b5('bum): de la sred pa mi dmigs/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ sred pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la len pa mi
40b6('bum): dmigs/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ len pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la srid pa mi dmigs/
40b7('bum): srid pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ srid pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la skye ba mi dmigs/ skye ba'i de bzhin
41a1('bum): nyid mi dmigs te/ skye ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rga shi mi dmigs/ rga shi'i de
41a2('bum): bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rga shi nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ sbyin
41a3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga
41a4('bum): la 'gyur/ de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
41a5('bum): nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i
41a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par
41a7('bum): ga la 'gyur/ de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
41b1('bum): nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha
41b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par
41b3('bum): ga la 'gyur/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi
41b4('bum): dmigs na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs
41b5('bum): te| nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi
41b6('bum): dmigs te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi
41b7('bum): de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi
42a1('bum): dmigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
42a2('bum): nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ chen po
42a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ don dam pa stong pa
42a4('bum): nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
42a5('bum): mi dmigs te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs/
42a6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la
42a7('bum): 'gyur/ de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs
42b1('bum): na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
42b2('bum): nyid mi dmigs te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dor ba med pa stong
42b3('bum): pa nyid mi dmigs/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par
42b4('bum): ga la 'gyur/ de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de
42b5('bum): bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
42b6('bum): kyang mi dmigs na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
42b7('bum): de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mi dmigs pa
43a1('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mi dmigs pa stong pa
43a2('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ dngos po med pa
43a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de
43a4('bum): bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
43a5('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ dngos po med
43a6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid mi
43a7('bum): dmigs te/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yang dag par spong ba
43b1('bum): rnams mi dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par
43b2('bum): ga la 'gyur/ de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
43b3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dbang po rnams mi dmigs/ dbang po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ dbang po nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ dbang po rnams kyi de
43b4('bum): bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la stobs rnams mi dmigs/ stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ stobs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin
43b5('bum): nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang mi dmigs
43b6('bum): na| byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
43b7('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga
44a1('bum): la 'gyur/ de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid
44a2('bum): kyang mi dmigs na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi de bzhin
44a3('bum): nyid mi dmigs te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs/
44a4('bum): tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms
44a5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs
44a6('bum): na| gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin
44a7('bum): nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
44b1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs
44b2('bum): na| mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
44b3('bum): med pa mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
44b4('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/
44b5('bum): de la mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs/ mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mngon par shes pa rnams
44b6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang mi dmigs na/
44b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs/ gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ gzungs kyi sgo
45a1('bum): nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi
45a2('bum): dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
45a3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs/ mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang mi dmigs
45a4('bum): na| mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin
45a5('bum): nyid mi dmigs te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la byams
45a6('bum): pa chen po mi dmigs/ byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par
45a7('bum): ga la 'gyur/ de la snying rje chen po mi dmigs/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid
45b1('bum): lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
45b2('bum): 'dres pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs/ rgyun du
45b3('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la
45b4('bum): 'gyur/ de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi
45b5('bum): dmigs na/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin
45b6('bum): nyid mi dmigs te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs/
45b7('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rang byang chub
46a1('bum): mi dmigs/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par
46a2('bum): ga la 'gyur/ de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs
46a3('bum): na| lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
46a4('bum): bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur// //
46a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya so gnyis pa/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa
46a6('bum): de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dge slong nyis brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong ma lnga brgya ni/ chos rnams la
46a7('bum): chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang / lha dang mi rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/ /byang chub
46b1('bum): sems dpa' yongs su nyams pa'i chos can drug cu ni/ nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di
46b2('bum): dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya bsnyen bkur te/ thams cad du'ang sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan bsgrubs/ shes
46b3('bum): rab bsgoms kyang / de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bas/ sbyin pa byin te/ 'di ni sbyin pa'o/ /'di la bdag
46b4('bum): gis sbyin par bya'o/ /'di ni tshul khrims so/ /bdag gis ni bsrung bar bya'o/ /'di ni bzod pa'o/ /bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o/ /'di ni brtson 'grus so/ /bdag gis ni brtsam
46b5('bum): par bya'o/ /'di ni bsam gtan no/ /bdag gis ni mnyam par bzhag par bya'o/ /'di ni shes rab bo/ /bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o/ zhes tha dad par spyod pas/ de dag shes
46b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bar sbyin pa gtong / tshul khrims srung / bzod pa sgom/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan la mnyam
46b7('bum): par gzhog / shes rab sgom par byed cing / de dag 'du shes sna tshogs kyis spyod pas/ tha mi dad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs so/ /de
47a1('bum): dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs pas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob/ phyir mi 'ong
47a2('bum): ba'i 'bras bu thob/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma med pa'am/ smon pa
47a3('bum): med pa yod mod kyi/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas/ nyan thos sam/
47a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la sgom du
47a5('bum): 'dra'ang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing / thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba rnams ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bgyis shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
47a6('bum): su 'gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dag ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis
47a7('bum): pa'i chos de dag nyid la sgom du bas kyang thabs mkhas pa la brten cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/
47b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral ba/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i
47b2('bum): chos 'ba' shig sgom pa ni thabs mkhas pa ma thob pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
47b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba rnams ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la sgom zhing / thabs mkhas pa thob pas byang chub
47b4('bum): sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bya zhig la
47b5('bum): lus dpag tshad brgya pa'am/ dpag tshad nyis brgya pa'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya pa'am/ dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa'am/ dpag tshad lnga brgya pa zhig yod la/ de sum cu rtsa gsum
47b6('bum): gyi lha'i ris nas 'dir 'ong bar 'dod la/ bya de la 'dab ma med pa zhig ste/ de dzam+bu'i gling du gnas so snyam nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas bdag nyid mchongs na/
47b7('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la ji snyam du sems/ gal te bya de lam nas mal bdag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la
48a1('bum): ji snyam du sems/ bya des phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom
48a2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te lam nas 'di snyam du ma la bdag gis ci nas kyang ma smas ma snad par dzam+bu'i gling du 'dug par bya'o snyam na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la
48a3('bum): ji snyam du sems/ bya de dzam+bu'i gling du ma smas ma snad par 'dug par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ni dzam+bu'i gling du
48a4('bum): lhung nas/ smas pa 'am snad par yang 'gyur/ 'gum pa'am gum la thug par sdug bsngal bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar lus che la
48a5('bum): 'dab ma ma mchis pa de ni/ de ltar 'gyur du gdon mi 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa
48a6('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa gtong zhing / tshul khrims srung / bzod pa sgom/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog cing / bla na med pa yang dag
48a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir de'i smon pa'ang che/ de'i sems bskyed pa'ang che/ yongs su 'dzin pa'ang tshad med du zin kyang /
48b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub
48b2('bum): sems dpa' des/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi ldan par sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan
48b3('bum): bsgrubs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
48b4('bum): sar ltung ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
48b5('bum): shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa sems shing / 'dzin la mtshan mar byed kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims
48b6('bum): mi shes/ ting nge 'dzin mi shes/ shes rab mi shes/ rnam par grol ba mi shes/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mi shes na/ de mi shes/ khong du ma chud pas stong pa
48b7('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra thos nas/ de ni de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar 'dzin te/ des de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar bzung zhing / bla na med pa yang
49a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la
49a2('bum): gnas par 'gyur ro/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par
49a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni de ltar 'gyur du gdon mi za'o/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye
49a4('bum): bar bzung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ma bral bar sbyin pa gtong zhing / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam
49a5('bum): gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral pa ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
49a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa de la mtshan mar mi byed de/
49a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin de la mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin na/ shA
49b1('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
49b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa byin yang mtshan mar ma bzung / tshul khrims bsrungs kyang mtshan mar ma
49b3('bum): bzung / bzod pa bsgrubs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / brtson 'grus brtsams kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / shes rab
49b4('bum): bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang /
49b5('bum): rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtshan mar ma bzung / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgoms kyang
49b6('bum): mtshan mar ma bzung ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims srung ba
49b7('bum): dang | mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bzod pa sgrub pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bsam
50a1('bum): gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis nang stong pa
50a2('bum): nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i
50a3('bum): sems kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis don dam pa stong pa
50a4('bum): nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan
50a5('bum): ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma
50a6('bum): dang bral ba'i sems kyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems
50a7('bum): kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mi
50b1('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /
50b2('bum): mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma
50b3('bum): dang bral ba'i sems kyis yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis
50b4('bum): dbang po rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis stobs rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan
50b5('bum): ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang
50b6('bum): bral ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshad med pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis gzugs med
50b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam par thar pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mthar gyis
51a1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
51a2('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin rnams
51a3('bum): sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom pa dang /
51a4('bum): mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang
51a5('bum): bral ba'i sems kyis snying rje chen po sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems
51a6('bum): kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis
51a7('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dgra bcom pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang byang chub sgom pa dang /
51b1('bum): mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
51b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
51b3('bum): chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral na/ de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom ma
51b4('bum): mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ gang mngon par rdzogs
51b5('bum): par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/
51b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'am/ mig gam/ rna ba'am/ sna'am/ lce'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra'am/ dri'am/ ro'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ mig gi rnam par shes
51b7('bum): pa'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'am/ mig gi 'dus te
52a1('bum): reg pa'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/
52a2('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
52a3('bum): ba'i tshor ba'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ me'i khams sam/
52a4('bum): rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ ming dang gzugs sam/ skye mched
52a5('bum): drug gam/ reg pa'am/ tshor ba'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa'am/ srid pa'am/ skye ba'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/
52a6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi
52a7('bum): stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas
52b1('bum): stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/
52b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med
52b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams
52b4('bum): sam| byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/
52b5('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
52b6('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
52b7('bum): stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
53a1('bum): sam| rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/
53a2('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang yang dmigs pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
53a3('bum): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom mchis par rig par bgyi
53a4('bum): ba ste| de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sbyin pa ci dang ci btang ba de thams
53a5('bum): cad mtshan mar bzung ste btang / de bzhin du tshul khrims gang dang gang bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa ci dang ci bsgrubs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang dang gang brtsams pa dang / bsam
53a6('bum): gtan gang dang gang la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / shes rab gang dang gang bsgoms pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar bzung ste bsgoms pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i
53a7('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du
53b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs
53b2('bum): mkhas pa dang bral bar rig par bgyi'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la gnas te/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa
53b3('bum): yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o/ /tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bzod pa bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o/ /bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag par bgyi'o/ /
53b4('bum): shes rab bsgom par bgyi'o/ /nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par
53b5('bum): bgyi'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad par
53b6('bum): bgyi'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /rang bzhin
53b7('bum): stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /
54a1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /
54a2('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /dbang po rnams la spyad
54a3('bum): par bgyi'o/ /stobs rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bgyi'o/ /'phags
54a4('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /bsam gtan rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /tshad med pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
54a5('bum): la spyad par bgyi'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
54a6('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyad par bgyi'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo
54a7('bum): rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad
54b1('bum): par bgyi'o/ /byams pa chen po la spyad par bgyi'o/ /snying rje chen po la spyad par bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
54b2('bum): la spyad par bgyi'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /rang byang chub
54b3('bum): la spyad par bgyi'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyad pa dang / gzugs yod pa
54b4('bum): na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos thams cad
54b5('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid la/ chos de dag kyang ma mchis shing mi dmigs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o/ /bcom
54b6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o/ /lha'i
54b7('bum): bu dag/ ngas kyang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ don dam par na gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am/ gang gis
55a1('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu
55a2('bum): dag| chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di
55a3('bum): skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o zhes gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba dang / bdag
55a4('bum): sems pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ni mi dka'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
55a5('bum): 'das/ de ni 'di ltar gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/ gang gis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/ gang yang mngon par rdzogs par
55a6('bum): 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'ang ma mchis te/ chos thams cad ni stong pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa la ni gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs
55a7('bum): par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad
55b1('bum): ni stong pa ste/ chos gang yang 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du'am/ yongs su 'grib par bgyi ba'i slad du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'am/ tshul khrims srung ba'am/ bzod pa bsgom
55b2('bum): pa'am/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa'am/ bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa'am/ shes rab bsgom pa'am/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ phyi nang
55b3('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/
55b4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom
55b5('bum): pa'am/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom
55b6('bum): pa'am/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
55b7('bum): bsgom pa'am/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa'am/ dbang po rnams bsgom pa'am/ stobs rnams bsgom pa'am/ byang chub
56a1('bum): kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'am/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa'am/ bsam
56a2('bum): gtan rnams bsgom pa'am/ tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa'am/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'am/ rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa'am/
56a3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa 'am/ mngon
56a4('bum): par shes pa rnams bsgom pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom pa'am/ mi
56a5('bum): 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa'am/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa'am/ byams pa chen po bsgom pa'am/ snying rje chen po bsgom pa'am/ sangs rgyas
56a6('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa'am/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
56a7('bum): bsgom pa'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ rang byang chub bsgom pa'am/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du
56b1('bum): bslab pa'i chos de dag kyang ma mchis pa ste/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am/ gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
56b2('bum): bgyi pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang stong pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
56b3('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis
56b4('bum): stong ngo / /'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /mig ni mig
56b5('bum): gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rna ba ni rna ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sna ni sna'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lce ni lce'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lus ni lus kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /
56b6('bum): yid ni yid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sgra ni sgra'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /dri ni dri'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /ro ni ro'i rang bzhin
56b7('bum): gyis stong ngo / /reg ni reg gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /chos ni chos kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rna
57a1('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lce'i
57a2('bum): rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /yid kyi rnam par shes
57a3('bum): pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus
57a4('bum): te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis
57a5('bum): stong ngo / /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /mig gi
57a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus
57a7('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /
57b1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
57b2('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sa'i khams
57b3('bum): ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /me'i khams ni me'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rlung gi khams ni rlung gi
57b4('bum): khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin
57b5('bum): gyis stong ngo / /ma rig pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /
57b6('bum): ming dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /reg pa ni reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /tshor ba ni
57b7('bum): tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sred pa ni sred pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /len pa ni len pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /srid pa ni srid pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /skye ba ni skye
58a1('bum): ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rga shi ni rga shi'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong
58a2('bum): ngo| |tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis
58a3('bum): stong ngo / /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
58a4('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /
58a5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa
58a6('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis
58a7('bum): stong ngo / /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /
58b1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis
58b2('bum): stong ngo / /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /chos thams cad
58b3('bum): stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /mi dmigs pa stong pa
58b4('bum): nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid
58b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni
58b6('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
58b7('bum): pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /dbang po rnams ni dbang po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stobs rnams ni stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang
59a1('bum): chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin
59a2('bum): gyis stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /tshad med
59a3('bum): pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rnam
59a4('bum): par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang
59a5('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
59a6('bum): med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyis stong
59a7('bum): ngo| |gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /
59b1('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /byams pa chen po ni
59b2('bum): byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i
59b3('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
59b4('bum): 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis
59b5('bum): stong ngo / /rang byang chub ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
59b6('bum): nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab
59b7('bum): 'byor rnam grangs des na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/
60a1('bum): de ni 'di ltar nam mkha' ni 'di snyam du bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du
60a2('bum): mi sems so/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'di snyam du bdag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
60a3('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang byang

67b1('bum): 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos
67b2('bum): de lta bu dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ 'o na tshor ba las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i

74b4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ 'o na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

74b6('bum): 'o na rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de
74b7('bum): ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ 'o na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu
75a1('bum): dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ 'o na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
75a2('bum): pa med pa las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/
75a3('bum): 'o na mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de
75a4('bum): ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ 'o na ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang
75a5('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ 'o na gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs

75a7('bum): chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshad dang ldan pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ 'o na mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag

76a1('bum): ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ 'o na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na gang bla na

81b6('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ lam gyi rnam
81b7('bum): pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na
82a1('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol
82a2('bum): tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya so bzhi pa/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na med pa

89a2('bum): chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyi dbyings las gud
89a3('bum): na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
89a4('bum): bu| de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyi gnas nyid las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/
89a5('bum): de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ chos skyon med pa nyid las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos
89a6('bum): de lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na gang bla na med pa
89a7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ji snyam
89b1('bum): du sems/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/
89b2('bum): de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ de ltar bden pa'i tshul bzhin du chos de dag mi dmigs na/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu gang zhig yod/
89b3('bum): smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi tshul dang / rnam pa des bstan pa ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa
89b4('bum): med de/ de ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gsum/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i gang zag gsum po de dag gi byang
89b5('bum): chub rnam par dgod par yang mi 'gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'dis byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa ltar na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
89b6('bum): po ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
89b7('bum): ti'i bu/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu'ang 'dod dam/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di la dri dgos so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/
90a1('bum): /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'dod dam/ rab
90a2('bum): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
90a3('bum): theg pa pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gsum du 'dod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin nyid
90a4('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' gsum du dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rgyu gcig gam/ rgyu
90a5('bum): gnyis sam/ rgyu gsum gyis de bzhin nyid dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin
90a6('bum): nyid la byang chub sems dpa' gcig yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ de ltar bden pa'i tshul bzhin du chos
90a7('bum): de dag mi dmigs na/ ci las tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni rang sangs rgyas
90b1('bum): kyi theg pa pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'o zhes bya bar sems par gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
90b2('bum): dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bye brag med par rab tu phye ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum zhing 'god pa med la
90b3('bum): yid la 'gyod pa med na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
90b4('bum): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ legs so/ legs so/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
90b5('bum): kyi phyir| khyod kyis tshig brjod pa legs par spobs so/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bye brag med par
90b6('bum): rab tu phye ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum zhing 'gong ba med la yid la 'gyod pa med cing / mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang
90b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bu'i
91a1('bum): chos dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

91a4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid du gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ mi mnyam pa'i
91a5('bum): sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste/ mi mnyam pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o/ /sems can thams
91a6('bum): cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste/ brlang ba'i sems kyis dmigs par
91a7('bum): mi bya'o| |sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la g.yo med par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/

91b2('bum): cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ khong khro ba'i sems mi bskyed do/ /sems can thams cad la mi 'tshe ba'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ 'tshe ba'i sems mi bskyed
91b3('bum): do| |sems can thams cad la mi 'tshe ba'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste/ 'tshe ba'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la ma'i sems dang / pha'i

91b5('bum): sems dang / phu nu dang / sring mo'i sems dang / grogs po dang / gnyen pa dang / rus gcig pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spang bar
91b6('bum): bya| gzhan yang srog gcod pa spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi
91b7('bum): legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spang bar bya/ gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/
92a1('bum): ma byin par len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang gis ma byin par len pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun

92a6('bum): yang dag par bskul bar bya/ phra ma spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang gis phra ma spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag
92a7('bum): gis kyang zhe gcod pa spong bar bya/ gzhan yang zhe gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ zhe gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang gis zhe gcod
92b1('bum): pa spangs pa de dag gis legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang tshig bkyal ba spang bar bya/ gzhan yang tshig bkyal ba spang ba la yang dag par

92b6('bum): log par lta ba spang bar bya/ gzhan yang log par lta ba spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang gis log par
92b7('bum): lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

93b7('bum): ba la mnyam par bzhag par bya/ gzhan yang dga' ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ dga' ba'i legs pa brjod par bya/ gzhan gang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug

94a5('bum): par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya/ gzhan yang sbyin pa'i
94a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
94a7('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya/ gzhan yang

94b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
94b7('bum): par bya/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan
95a1('bum): gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis

95a3('bum): legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs par brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste/ de
95a4('bum): l tar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas
95a5('bum): par bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya/ gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ nang stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod
95a6('bum): par bya| sems can gzhan gang nang stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs par brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid la mnyam
95a7('bum): par bzhag par bya/ gzhan yang phyi stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang phyi stong pa nyid la snyoms
95b1('bum): par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya/ gzhan yang phyi nang stong pa nyid la

95b3('bum): pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya/ gzhan yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ stong pa nyid stong
95b4('bum): pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang chen
95b5('bum): po stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya/ gzhan yang chen po stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang
95b6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya/ gzhan
95b7('bum): yang don dam pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya/ sems can gzhan gang don dam pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug
96a1('bum): pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya/ gzhan yang
