304b1('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod
304b2('bum): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam
304b3('bum): du sems/ chos gang khyed kyis ma mthong ba'i chos de dmigs su yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
304b4('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang dmigs su med pa de skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
304b5('bum): rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ste/ rab 'byor/ bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
304b6('bum): dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
304b7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i lam zhes bya ste/ lam der zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod/ de ltar
305a1('bum): rtsol| de ltar 'bad pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mi
305a2('bum): 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/ de'i chos
305a3('bum): de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
305a4('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ chos thams cad kyi mi skye ba nyid gang lags pa de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
305a5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ skye
305a6('bum): ba'ang ma lags/ mi skye ba 'ang ma lags pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tam/ bcom
305a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te skye ba'ang ma lags/ mi skye ba 'ang ma lags pa las kyang byang chub
305b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag
305b2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
305b3('bum): byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/
305b4('bum): chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/
305b5('bum): chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos kyang
305b6('bum): bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i
305b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /'dis ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /'di ni mngon par
306a1('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
306a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa de thams cad med pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par mi rtog
306a3('bum): pa'o| |shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu lnga pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
306a4('bum): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zab pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i
306a5('bum): slad du blta dka' ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du rtogs par dka' ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha
306a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag tu ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag pa'i spyod
306a7('bum): yul ma lags pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zhi ba phra ba zhib pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
306b1('bum): pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du mkhas shing rig pas rtogs par bgyi ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /
306b2('bum): 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi
306b3('bum): bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/
306b4('bum): de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin
306b5('bum): nyid du nan tan byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go
306b6('bum): mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las
306b7('bum): kyi lam dang ldan par gyur/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ mngon par shes
307a1('bum): pa lnga dang ldan par gyur la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par
307a2('bum): byed par 'gyur te/ bzung zhing bcangs/ klags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/ kau shi ka/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des
307a3('bum): brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char
307a4('bum): yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /
307a5('bum): grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de nas dge slong gcig gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka/ dzam bu'i gling gi
307a6('bum): sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/
307a7('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'dzin pa dang /
307b1('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
307b2('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag gis zil gyis non to/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dge
307b3('bum): slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong / dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ gzugs
307b4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
307b5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pas kyang zil gyis non na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
307b6('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te/ klags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma
307b7('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
308a1('bum): 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar
308a2('bum): yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
308a3('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
308a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas su'ang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs
308a5('bum): mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par
308a6('bum): yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa
308a7('bum): dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad
308b1('bum): de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha
308b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
308b3('bum): chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang
308b4('bum): ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang
308b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang
308b6('bum): zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
308b7('bum): la ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag ni/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
309a1('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji skad du bstan pa dang mthun par spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
309a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du gnas pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs
309a3('bum): pa rnams rgyang ring du mi byed pa'o/ /de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub las 'phang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'
309a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sems can bying ba rnams 'don par 'dod pa'o/ /de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
309a5('bum): bslab pa la slob pa ste/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no/ /de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
309a6('bum): dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'gro bar bya bar sems te/ nye bar 'dong zhing 'di skad ces smra'o/ /kye skyes bu chen po myur du slobs shig /skyes bu chen
309a7('bum): po skyen par slobs shig / lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni khyod kyis snying po byang chub tu 'dug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
309b1('bum): rgyas nas blang bar bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhes pa'o zhes zer zhing ston to/ /de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
309b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'dong bar sems
309b3('bum): so| |de'i drung du bdag kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/ lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'am mtshe ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems
309b4('bum): so| |lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/ /lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' yang 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan
309b5('bum): cig 'gro bar sems so/ /lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/ /tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po 'ang tshangs ris
309b6('bum): kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /
309b7('bum): 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /shin
310a1('bum): tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha
310a2('bum): rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa
310a3('bum): rnams kyis kyang rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de ltar spyod pa de'i lus la ni/ 'jig
310a4('bum): rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa gang ji snyed cig lus la 'byung ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste/ dge slong de ni byang
310a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du 'gyur ba ste/ 'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyed pa 'di lta
310a6('bum): ste| mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad dam/ snying gi nad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste/
310a7('bum): 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
310b1('bum): dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di rang gi spobs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod
310b2('bum): dam| 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ tshe
310b3('bum): dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa dga' bo/ bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs
310b4('bum): pa brjod pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mthur rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dga' bo/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin
310b5('bum): te| lha'i dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan dang / legs pa brjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs
310b6('bum): pa'i mthu'o/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs so/ /dga' bo/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang /
310b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa de'i tshe/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig to
311a1('bum): can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs
311a2('bum): pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin gyi/
311a3('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/ dogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe
311a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro/ /
311a5('bum): dga' bo/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'
311a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa las sems gcig tsam 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang / zhum par 'gyur ba dang / spu g.yo bar 'gyur
311a7('bum): bar skar mda' ltung bar gtong zhing 'jigs pa bskyed do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/
311b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ byang chub
311b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no/ /dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du
311b3('bum): mchi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sems
311b4('bum): mos par ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo / /dga' bo/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
311b5('bum): bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ 'on tam ma yin zhes the tshom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo / /dga' bo/
311b6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral na/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi thos so/ /ma thos
311b7('bum): pas mi shes so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bsgom pa ma shes pas de bzhin nyid du nan tan mi byed do/ /dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis
312a1('bum): glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral la/ dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs
312a2('bum): su 'dzin pa byed na/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
312a3('bum): bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa brjod na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni bdag gi grogs yin te/ gang
312a4('bum): dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po'i nang nas/ bdag gis grogs su rnyed pa ste/ de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa
312a5('bum): dang | rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig tu gnas par 'gyur ba ni/ de bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' de
312a6('bum): la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu la bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/ byang chub sems
312a7('bum): dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab ste/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
312b1('bum): 'di thos pas ci zhig bya/ bsgoms pa dang bzung ba dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhig bya/ ngas kyang de'i gting ma rnyed na/ khyod kyis lta rnyed re skan zhes zer na/ dga'
312b2('bum): bo| byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang
312b3('bum): chub sems dpa' brnyes par skyed cing / nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /nga ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /nga ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
312b4('bum): pa'o| |nga ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /nga ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ khyod ni sbyin
312b5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni brtson
312b6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no zhes rlom
312b7('bum): sems su byed na/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag
313a1('bum): nyid mchog tu rlom sems bskyed na/ dga' bo/ de'i tshe bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / nyams bde ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim zhing
313a2('bum): yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems
313a3('bum): dpa'i ming brjod pa'am/ rus brjod pa kun tu grags par gyur na/ de ming brjod pa 'am rus brjod pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos
313a4('bum): can dag khyad du gsod cing bdag bstod gzhan smod la/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mar bya ba'i yon
313a5('bum): tan de dag kyang de la med par rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma de dag gis nyon mongs pa bskyed cing bdag bstod gzhan smod de/ 'di skad du ji ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg
313a6('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par
313a7('bum): mi snang ngo zhes de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la mi snyan par brjod cing smod na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gnas ni stongs
313b1('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dwags kyi yul yang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes ci nas kyang de'i
313b2('bum): tshig gzung du rung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gyis rlob ste/ de'i tshig bzung du rung bas skye bo mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang / yid ches par
313b3('bum): bya bar sems te/ de la de dag gis thos sam/ mthong na mthun par spyod par 'gyur te/ de dag gis thos sam mthong nas mthun par spyod cing de bzhin du slob ste/ de dag de bzhin nyid du
313b4('bum): slob cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i tshe/ nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci log du gyur pas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las gang dang
313b5('bum): gang brtsams pa de thams cad mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/
313b6('bum): byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dwags kyi yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ dga' bo/ don
313b7('bum): gyi dbang de mthong nas/ bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
314a1('bum): pa pa gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rtsod cing / nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi/ khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du
314a2('bum): sems te/ kye rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
314a3('bum): 'thab mo dang / 'khrug pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te/ de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo/ /de ni byol song
314a4('bum): gi skye gnas kyi lam mo/ /de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo/ /de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang gang
314a5('bum): zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la/ 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems
314a6('bum): te| 'di gnyis ka'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o/ /'di gnyis ka'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi
314a7('bum): rgya'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems
314b1('bum): can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhes nas dga' zhing spro ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/
314b2('bum): gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing / 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/
314b3('bum): gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi btang zhe na/ ci tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru bar gyur
314b4('bum): ba de srid kyi bskal par go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam/ 'on te ma lags
314b5('bum): kyi| bskal pa de snyed kho nar go cha bgo 'chal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
314b6('bum): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te/ dga' bo/ de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa/ byang chub
314b7('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang 'thab cing rtsod la gshe zhing mi snyan du brjod pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod de gshe ba dang / mi snyan par brjod pa byas nas/ phyir mi chags
315a1('bum): par mdud par 'dzin cing khon du gzung ste gnas na/ dga' bo/ gang zag de ni 'byung bar nga mi smra ste/ gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
315a2('bum): pa nyid yongs su mi btang zhe na/ gdon mi za bar bskal ba de snyed du go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thab cing rtsod de
315a3('bum): gshe ba dang mi snyan par brjod par gyur na'ang / mdud par mi 'dzin la phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin cing / bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste/ bdag gis sems
315a4('bum): can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na/ de ltar bdag smras pa la phyir smra ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na/ de ltar na
315a5('bum): bdag gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing / phyir zlogs pa ni mi tshul gyis/ bdag gis de ltar mi bya'i/ bdag gis glen pa dang / lkug pa bzhin du bya'o/ /bdag gi bsam pa la
315a6('bum): 'khrug pa med par bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla
315a7('bum): bar bya dgos na/ de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyi/ bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o/ /bdag gis
315b1('bum): de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de/ de la ni bdud sdig to can glags lta zhing glags
315b2('bum): tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do/ /dga' bo/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o/ /de dag dang
315b3('bum): lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o/ /'dug par mi bya'o/ /gal te 'dug na'ang des su la'ang gnod sems su mi bya/ 'khrug par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang bdag gis 'di
315b4('bum): dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang / 'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la mi tshul lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
315b5('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o/ /dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar byang
315b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/
315b7('bum): dper na/ ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe
316a1('bum): na| 'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o/ /'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o/ /'dis sbyin pa'i
316a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
316a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa
316a4('bum): nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa
316a5('bum): nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
316a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
316a7('bum): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad
316b1('bum): med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
316b2('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
316b3('bum): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad
316b4('bum): shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang la bslab par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /
316b5('bum): des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston pa ste/ gal te de 'dres par spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
316b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral bar gyur na de la bdag gis bslab par mi bya'i/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
316b7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas na/ bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
317a1('bum): bslab pa mnyam pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu zhe drug pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
317a2('bum): pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya zhe drug pa/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
317a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan
317a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub
317a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /
317a6('bum): rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ chen po stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'
317a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/
317b1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
317b2('bum): po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ thog ma dang tha ma
317b3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
317b4('bum): kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni
317b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam
317b6('bum): pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni byang
317b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /
318a1('bum): rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs ni
318a2('bum): gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba ni tshor bas stong / 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong / 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / mig ni mig
318a3('bum): gis stong / rna ba ni rna bas stong / sna ni snas stong / lce ni lces stong / lus ni lus kyis stong / yid ni yid kyis stong / gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / sgra ni sgras stong / dri
318a4('bum): ni dris stong / ro ni ros stong / reg ni reg gis stong / chos ni chos kyis stong / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna
318a5('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pas stong / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong / lus kyi rnam par shes pa
318a6('bum): ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong / mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong / rna ba'i 'dus
318a7('bum): te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
318b1('bum): ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
318b2('bum): bas stong / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
318b3('bum): tshor bas stong / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
318b4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong / chu'i khams ni chu'i
318b5('bum): khams kyis stong / me'i khams ni me'i khams kyis stong / rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong / nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong / rnam par shes pa'i
318b6('bum): khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong / ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong / 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / ming dang gzugs
318b7('bum): ni ming dang gzugs kyis stong / skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong / reg pa ni reg pas stong / tshor ba ni tshor bas stong / sred pa ni sred pas stong / len pa ni len pas stong /
319a1('bum): srid pa ni srid pas stong / skye ba ni skye bas stong / rga shi ni rga shis stong / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong / tshul khrims kyi pha rol

369a6('bum): chen po ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa bcu gnyis
369a7('bum): lan gsum du bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad
369b1('bum): yongs su smin par bya'o zhes slob pa yin/ rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi 'chad pa'i

369b3('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dus byas kyi khams bstan par bya'o zhes slob pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ sems can dma' bas ni bslab pa brgya chen po 'di
369b4('bum): la bslab par mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba las gdon par 'dod pa ste/ rab
369b5('bum): 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can dmyal bar mi skye'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas su mi skye'o/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi
369b6('bum): skye'o/ /yul mtha' 'khob tu mi skye'o/ /yul gcong rong can du mi skye'o/ /phyag dar ba dang / gdol pa'i rigs su mi skye'o/ /zhar bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sgur por mi 'gyur ro/ /zha
369b7('bum): bor mi 'gyur ro/ /yan lag skyon can du mi 'gyur ro/ /'on par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag pa med par mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur te/ dbang po yongs su tshang
370a1('bum): zhing dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /srog gcod par mi 'gyur ro/ /ma byin par len par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dod pas log par g.yem par mi 'gyur ro/ /
370a2('bum): brdzun du smra bar mi 'gyur ro/ /phra ma can du mi 'gyur ro/ /zhe gcod pa smra bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshig bskyal pa can du mi 'gyur ro/ /chags sems can du mi 'gyur ro/ /gnod sems
370a3('bum): can du mi 'gyur ro/ /log par lta bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'tsho ba log pas 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa ma yin pas yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims ngan pa
370a4('bum): can du mi 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims ngan pa yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha tshe rings po'i nang
370a5('bum): du mi skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha tshe rings por mi skye ba'i thabs mkhas pa de lta bu de la
370a6('bum): yod de/ de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las thabs mkhas pa bstan te/ thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
370a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug / tshad med pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snyoms
370b1('bum): par 'jug ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
370b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'di lta ste nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba'i dri ma yongs su dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongs su dag pa
370b3('bum): 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang gi stobs
370b4('bum): yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor/ chos
370b5('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
370b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems zhum pa med cing 'god pa med pa de ni/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni chos nyid de mi shes mi
370b7('bum): mthong bas/ sems can de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ bzod pa'i pha
371a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/
371a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid la spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ 'dus byas
371a3('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod/
371a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la
371a5('bum): spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la spyod/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
371a6('bum): bzhi la spyod/ dbang po lnga la spyod/ stobs lnga la spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod/
371a7('bum): bsam gtan bzhi la spyod/ tshad med pa bzhi la spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
371b1('bum): 'jug pa dgu la spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod/
371b2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod/ byams pa chen po la spyod/ snying
371b3('bum): rje chen po la spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
371b4('bum): la spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod/ rang byang chub la spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod de/ rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
371b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad kyi stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa nyid rab tu thob par 'gyur te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo / /rab 'byor/
371b6('bum): de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / g.yo ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/
371b7('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po'i phyogs gang na dzam+bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi sa le sbram 'byung ba de lta bu ni chos nyung ngo / /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
372a1('bum): tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la slob pa'i sems can de lta bu'ang nyung ste/ sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par
372a2('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas ches mang ngo / /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sems can gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas
372a3('bum): pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/ sems can gang khams kyi rgyal phran du 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa de lta bu ni ches mang ngo / /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du sems
372a4('bum): can gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'dir 'jug pa de lta bu'ang nyung ste/ sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rab sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni
372a5('bum): de bas kyang ches mang ngo / /rab 'byor/ gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de
372a6('bum): dag pas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de lta bu ches nyung ngo / /de bas kyang sems can gang nyan thos sam/ rang sangs
372a7('bum): rgyas su gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ches mang ngo / /rab 'byor/ gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
372b1('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing / the tshom med par phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon pa de dag pas ni/ gang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de lta bu ches mang ngo / /rab 'byor/
372b2('bum): de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'dod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sar chud par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
372b3('bum): 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems
372b4('bum): mi skye'o/ /tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /le lo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /g.yeng ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /
372b5('bum): shes rab 'chal pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /
372b6('bum): tha ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /'du shes dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /'du byed dang ldan pa'i
372b7('bum): sems mi skye'o/ /rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /mig dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rna ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /
373a1('bum): lce dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /lus dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /yid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems
373a2('bum): mi skye'o/ /sgra dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /dri dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /ro dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /reg dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /chos dang ldan pa'i
373a3('bum): sems mi skye'o/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rna'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan
373a4('bum): pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang
373a5('bum): ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rna'i 'dus te reg pa dang ldan
373a6('bum): pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i
373a7('bum): sems mi skye'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /sna'i
373b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
373b2('bum): ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /sa'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /chu'i khams dang ldan
373b3('bum): pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /me'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rlung gi khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /nam mkha'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rnam par
373b4('bum): shes pa'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /ma rig pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /'du byed dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi
373b5('bum): skye'o| |ming dang gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /skye mched drug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /
373b6('bum): sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /len pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /srid pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /skye ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rga shi dang ldan pa'i
373b7('bum): sems mi skye'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan
374a1('bum): pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems
374a2('bum): mi skye'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /nang stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /phyi nang
374a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid
374a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
374a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rang bzhin
374a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /mi dmigs
374a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /dngos po med
374b1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /yang dag par spong ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi
374b2('bum): rkang pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /dbang po dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /stobs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /'phags
374b3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /bsam gtan dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /tshad med pa dang ldan
374b4('bum): pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
374b5('bum): pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems
374b6('bum): mi skye'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /mi 'jigs
374b7('bum): pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i
375a1('bum): sems mi skye'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /lan
375a2('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rang byang
375a3('bum): chub dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
375a4('bum): rab 'byor/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang dmigs pa med do/ /mi dmigs
375a5('bum): pas chos gang la 'ang sems bskyed pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu
375a6('bum): phyin pa thams cad yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang mthun par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
375a7('bum): na| rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'jig tshogs su lta
375b1('bum): bar lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang 'dus pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so/ /rab
375b2('bum): 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa'i 'tsho ba'i dbang po 'gags pas/ dbang po thams cad 'gags par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub
375b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa'
375b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
375b5('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa la slob pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ stong
375b6('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/
375b7('bum): mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams kyang mang ba lags na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci
376a1('bum): 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag
376a2('bum): thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
376a3('bum): cad re re la'ang / sku tshe'i mthar phyin gyi bar du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par/ na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun
376a4('bum): gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byas na/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel
376a5('bum): lam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs
376a6('bum): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan
376a7('bum): byed na/ de'i bsod nams chos mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de
376b1('bum): ltar don chen por 'gyur ba ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams
376b2('bum): cad kyi bla na med par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sems can mgon med pa thams cad kyi mgon du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /
376b3('bum): gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / long ba rnams kyi mig tu 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / mun par gnas pa rnams kyi sgron mar 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sangs
376b4('bum): rgyas su 'gyur ba 'thob par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par brtse bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi seng
376b5('bum): ge'i nga ro bsgrag par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnga brdung bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dung 'bud par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gtam bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol
376b6('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni phun sum tshogs pa gang thob par
376b7('bum): bya ba de dag las ma thob pa gang yang med do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bgyi ba lags sam/ rang sangs
377a1('bum): rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des 'thob par bgyi ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nyan thos kyi phun sum
377a2('bum): tshogs pa'ang des 'thob par bya/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des 'thob par bya ste/ de la gnas par mi bya/ 'dug par mi bya'i/ shes pa dang mthong bas de dag
377a3('bum): mthong bar bya ste/ de las 'da' bar bya/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
377a4('bum): ni| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar
377a5('bum): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar
377a6('bum): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de ma yin pa sbyin pa'i gnas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan
377a7('bum): cing 'gro bar gyur pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes
377b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi gtong zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
377b2('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su mi nyam pa'i chos can du rig par bya ste/ nyan
377b3('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ring du byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa yin/ gal te yang 'di snyam du 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol
377b4('bum): tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub par bya'o snyam ste/ gal te de ltar shes na
377b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gal te 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di na yod do zhes bya bar shes pa med de/ gang
377b6('bum): gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas byung ste/ bla na med pa yang
377b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'ang mi shes mi mthong zhing / de 'di snyam ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag
378a1('bum): pa'i mtha' gnas pa'i phyir/ 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na yod pa'ang ma yin/ shes
378a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis ni chos gang yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang med do zhes/ rab 'byor/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab
378a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
378a4('bum): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
378a5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod/ nang stong pa
378a6('bum): nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
378a7('bum): dang | 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong
378b1('bum): pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
378b2('bum): nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang spyod/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
378b3('bum): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
378b4('bum): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la'ang spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
378b5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la'ang spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
378b6('bum): dang | de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
378b7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang spyod bzhin du sems can thams cad zil gyis non na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
379a1('bum): par gyur na lta ci smos/ sems can gang gi sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa de dag kyang thob pa legs par thob cing / de dag gi 'tsho ba
379a2('bum): legs par 'tsho ba yin na/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lta ci smos/ sems can gang gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
379a3('bum): chub tu sems bskyed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa de dag ni/ kun gyis yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin no snyam nas/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis me tog mnad
379a4('bum): ra ba mang po blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas/ me tog mnad ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor
379a5('bum): to| |mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /de ltar gtor te/ mngon par gtor ba dang / rab tu gtor bar byas nas/ tshig 'di skad du brjod do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis
379a6('bum): g ang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par
379a7('bum): gyur cig / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ rang byung gi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /zag pa med pa'i chos rnams
379b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa las slar
379b2('bum): log par 'gyur bar sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar log ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs
379b3('bum): rgyas su 'gyur bar sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis kyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed cing / yang dang yang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
379b4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang po 'di dag mthong nas/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don du mos/ sman par mos/
379b5('bum): bde bar mos shing / legs par bgyi bar mos te/ sems bskyed pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar rtog ste/ ci bdag brgal
379b6('bum): nas sems can ma brgal ba sgrol bar 'gyur ram/ ci bdag grol nas sems can ma grol ba dgrol bar 'gyur ram/ ci bdag dbugs phyin nas sems can dbugs ma phyung ba
379b7('bum): dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ram/ ci bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sems can yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur ram zhes rtog par
380a1('bum): bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa
380a2('bum): de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / yun ring po nas spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar
380a3('bum): bgyid pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i
380a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig tu
380a5('bum): 'phel bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
380a6('bum): gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ stong
380a7('bum): gi 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do/ /
380b1('bum): kau shi ka/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do/ /
380b2('bum): kau shi ka/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod
380b3('bum): nams la ni tshad med do/ /kau shi ka/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po rnams la chu'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de ni/ skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags
380b4('bum): pa'i cha gcig gis chu'i thigs pa blang ba'i tshad kyis tshad gzung par rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do/ /
380b5('bum): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang
380b6('bum): bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de
380b7('bum): dag ni bdud kyi phyogs su gyur pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos
381a1('bum): pa'o| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis sems bskyed pa 'di bsgrubs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
381a2('bum): chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas 'jig par bgyid pa ste/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems
381a3('bum): can de dag ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyi ba ste/ gang gis sangs rgyas yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba de dag gis
381a4('bum): sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o/ /rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bgyis te/ ji ltar gnyis kyi 'du
381a5('bum): shes su mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis su med pa'i 'du shes su'ang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de de bzhin
381a6('bum): no| |de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/ /kau shi ka/ gang sems bskyed pa 'di dag la rjes su yi rang bar byed pa de dag ni/ myur du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
381a7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan
381b1('bum): pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan pa dag ni/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de dag tu rim gro bya bar 'gyur ro/ /bkur stir bya bar 'gyur ro/ /phu dud du bya bar
381b2('bum): 'gyur ro/ /mchod par bya bar 'gyur ro/ /des nam yang gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nam yang sgra yid du mi 'ong ba thos par mi 'gyur ro/ /nam yang dri yid du
381b3('bum): mi 'ong ba tshor bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nam yang ro yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nam yang reg yid du mi 'ong ba reg par mi 'gyur ro/ /nam yang chos yid du mi 'ong ba
381b4('bum): shes par mi 'gyur ro/ /nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas bcom
381b5('bum): ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag
381b6('bum): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa tshad
381b7('bum): med| grangs med/ dpag tu med pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byas pa'i phyir te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis rnam par 'phel bas/ bla na med pa yang
382a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa yin te/ de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
382a2('bum): rgyas nas sems can tshad med/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
382a3('bum): des ci nas kyang sems med pa dang / sems ma yin pa gzhan yang med par theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge
382a4('bum): ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang bar byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /sems med pa dang / sems ma yin pa gzhan yang
382a5('bum): med par spyad pa spyod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la'ang rjes su yi rang bar byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag
382a6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya zhe dgu pa/ /de nas tshe dang
382a7('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na sgyu ma lta bu'i sems/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
382b1('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu'i sems de khyod kyis
382b2('bum): yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis sgyu ma'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / sgyu ma lta bu'i
382b3('bum): sems de'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ de ltar sgyu ma'ang ma mthong / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems
382b4('bum): kyang ma mthong na/ sems gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sems de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/
382b5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gud
382b6('bum): na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom
382b7('bum): ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gud na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
383a1('bum): par 'tshang rgya ba de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis chos gzhan yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/
383a2('bum): mchis pa'am ma mchis pa'i chos gang zhig bdag gis bstan par bgyi/ chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni mchis pa'am ma mchis par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos gang shin tu dben
383a3('bum): pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/ ma mchis pa'i chos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
383a4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar gang nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos thams
383a5('bum): cad ni ma mchis shing yongs su ma mchis pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /bsam gtan
383a6('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha
383a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /phyi nang
383b1('bum): stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /
383b2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med
383b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shin tu
383b4('bum): dben pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid
383b5('bum): stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams
383b6('bum): ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /dbang po rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /stobs rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag
383b7('bum): rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams ni shin tu
384a1('bum): dben pa'o/ /tshad med pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /rnam par thar
384a2('bum): pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
384a3('bum): dang | smon pa med pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu dben
384a4('bum): pa'o| |de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /byams
384a5('bum): pa chen po ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /snying rje chen po ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
384a6('bum): ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /
384a7('bum): rang byang chub ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /chos gang shin tu dben
384b1('bum): pa de ni bsgom par bgyi pa'ang ma lags/ rnam par bsgom par bgyi ba'ang ma lags te/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa'i slad du chos gang yang bsgrub
384b2('bum): pa ma mchis so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa lags na/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
384b3('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shin tu dben pa lags na/ de ji
384b4('bum): ltar dben pas dben pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ legs so/ legs so/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/
384b5('bum): rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben
384b6('bum): pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /nang
384b7('bum): stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /chen po stong
385a1('bum): pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
385a2('bum): ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni
385a3('bum): shin tu dben pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /
385a4('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
385a5('bum): stong pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni
