385a6('bum): shin tu dben pa'o/ /dbang po rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /stobs rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam
385a7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /tshad med pa rnams ni shin tu
385b1('bum): dben pa'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
385b2('bum): pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /
385b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni shin tu
385b4('bum): dben pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /byams pa chen po ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /snying rje chen po ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
385b5('bum): pa bco brgyad ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni
385b6('bum): shin tu dben pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /rang byang chub ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
385b7('bum): pa nyid ni shin tu dben pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
386a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha
386a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
386a3('bum): shin tu dben pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / 'dus ma byas
386a4('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
386a5('bum): shin tu dben pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
386a6('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
386a7('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams shin tu dben pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin
386b1('bum): tu dben pa dang / dbang po rnams shin tu dben pa dang / stobs rnams shin tu dben pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shin tu dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
386b2('bum): brgyad pa shin tu dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / bsam gtan rnams shin tu dben pa dang / tshad med pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / gzugs
386b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben
386b4('bum): pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shin tu dben pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
386b5('bum): shin tu dben pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu dben pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shin tu dben pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi shin tu dben pa dang / so so
386b6('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi shin tu dben pa dang / byams pa chen po shin tu dben pa dang / snying rje chen po shin tu dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin
386b7('bum): tu dben pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang /
387a1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / rang byang chub shin tu dben pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / rnam pa
387a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu dben pa de bzhin du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang shin tu dben pa'o/ /rab
387a3('bum): 'byor/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin
387a4('bum): tu dben par ma gyur/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin
387a5('bum): tu dben par ma gyur/ nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ phyi stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ stong pa nyid stong
387a6('bum): pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ chen po stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu
387a7('bum): dben par ma gyur/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
387b1('bum): shin tu dben par ma gyur/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu dben par
387b2('bum): ma gyur/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma
387b3('bum): gyur| ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben par
387b4('bum): ma gyur/ yang dag par spong ba rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/ dbang po rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/ stobs rnams
387b5('bum): shin tu dben par ma gyur/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/ 'phags pa'i bden
387b6('bum): pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/ bsam gtan rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/ tshad med pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
387b7('bum): rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/ rnam par thar pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/ rnam par
388a1('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/ mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/
388a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/ mi 'jigs
388a3('bum): pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/ byams pa chen po shin tu dben par ma gyur/ snying rje chen po shin tu dben
388a4('bum): par ma gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin tu dben par ma gyur/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shin tu dben par ma gyur/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
388a5('bum): 'bras bu shin tu dben par ma gyur/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben par ma gyur/ dgra bcom pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ rang byang chub shin tu dben par ma
388a6('bum): gyur| lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur
388a7('bum): ro| |de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de tshul khrims
388b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nang stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyi stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyi nang stong pa nyid du mi
388b2('bum): 'gyur ro/ /de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de chen po stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de don dam pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de 'dus byas stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur
388b3('bum): ro| |de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de dor ba med pa
388b4('bum): stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de rang bzhin stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de mi dmigs
388b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de
388b6('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro/ /de yang dag par spong ba rnams su mi 'gyur ro/ /de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro/ /de dbang po rnams su mi 'gyur ro/ /de
388b7('bum): stobs rnams su mi 'gyur ro/ /de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su mi 'gyur ro/ /de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su
389a1('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ /de bsam gtan rnams su mi 'gyur ro/ /de tshad med pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro/ /de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su
389a2('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ /de rnam par thar pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro/ /de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro/ /de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
389a3('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mi 'gyur ro/ /de mngon par shes pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro/ /de ting nge 'dzin rnams su mi 'gyur ro/ /de gzungs kyi sgo rnams su mi
389a4('bum): 'gyur ro/ /de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur mi 'gyur ro/ /de mi 'jigs pa bzhir mi 'gyur ro/ /de so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir mi 'gyur ro/ /de byams pa
389a5('bum): chen por mi 'gyur ro/ /de snying rje chen por mi 'gyur ro/ /de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du mi 'gyur ro/ /de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro/ /de
389a6('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur/ ro/ /de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro/ /de dgra bcom pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de rang byang chub tu mi 'gyur ro/ /de
389a7('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bas na ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben
389b1('bum): pa dang / ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
389b2('bum): shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben
389b3('bum): pa dang / ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar chen po stong
389b4('bum): pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin
389b5('bum): tu dben pa dang / ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dor ba med pa stong
389b6('bum): pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong
389b7('bum): pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
390a1('bum): shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
390a2('bum): ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar
390a3('bum): stobs rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu dben pa dang /
390a4('bum): ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar bsam gtan rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar tshad med pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar
390a5('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rnam par thar pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
390a6('bum): 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar mngon par
390a7('bum): shes pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
390b1('bum): pa'i stobs rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar byams pa
390b2('bum): chen po shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar snying rje chen po shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i
390b3('bum): 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar dgra bcom pa
390b4('bum): nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rang byang chub shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang / ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin
390b5('bum): tu dben pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya/ dben pas dben
390b6('bum): pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma
390b7('bum): brten par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
391a1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o/ /
391a2('bum): rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar don zab mo la spyod cing / 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gyur ba'i don de mngon
391a3('bum): du mi byed pa de ni dka' ba byed pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ dka' ba cung zad kyang mi bgyid na/ ji
391a4('bum): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba bgyid pa lags/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar gang mngon du bgyi ba'i don de'ang
391a5('bum): mi dmigs/ /gang gis mngon du bgyi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs/ gang mngon du bgyi ba'i chos de'ang mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos
391a6('bum): t hams cad gang mngon du bgyis pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i don mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu'ang
391a7('bum): gang zhig mchis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gang zhig gis mngon du bgyi/ chos mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu'ang gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni
391b1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i spyod pa ste/ de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mun pa ma mchis pa 'thob pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de skad
391b2('bum): du bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum/ yongs su mi 'jum zhing mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar spyod
391b3('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ de ni spyod do zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
391b4('bum): phyin pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /
391b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni 'di snyam du bdag gis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bsring bar
391b6('bum): bya ste/ bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur to snyam yang mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'di ltar bdag ni la la dang ni ring
391b7('bum): ngo| |la la dang ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ nam mkha' la bye brag ma mchis shing / mi g.yo ba dang rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i
392a1('bum): slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di ltar bdag las
392a2('bum): nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring gi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes
392a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni 'di ltar bdag las sgyu ma ni ring ngo / /sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni
392a4('bum): nye'o| |skye bo'i tshogs 'di ltar 'dus pa ni bdag las ring ngo zhe'am/ nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni rnam par mi
392a5('bum): rtog pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang / 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos
392a6('bum): sam| rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo / /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi
392a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs brnyan ni 'di ltar bdag las dmigs pa gang gis gzugs brnyan byung
392b1('bum): ba de ni nye/ gang me long dang snod chus gang ba'i nang du byung ba de ni bdag las ring ngo zhes bgyi bar mi sems so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs brnyan rnam par mi
392b2('bum): rtog pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos sam/
392b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo / /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
392b4('bum): pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni sdug pa dang mi sdug pa ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'di la sdug
392b5('bum): pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni sdug
392b6('bum): pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis
392b7('bum): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o/ /bcom ldan
393a1('bum): 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa ste/ de
393a2('bum): ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul
393a3('bum): pa ni 'di ltar nga las nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo / /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi dgongs so/ /de ci'i slad
393a4('bum): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub
393a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo / /bla na med pa yang dag
393a6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom
393a7('bum): ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa zhig sprul pa mdzad na/ de ni don gang gi slad du sprul pa de'i don sbyor te/ sprul pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi
393b1('bum): rtog go / bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang don gang gi slad du brjod pa'i don de'ang bgyid de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni mi rtog rnam
393b2('bum): par mi rtog pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing mkhan nam/ shing mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis bud med kyi gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs sam/
393b3('bum): glang po'i gzugs sam/ chibs rta'i gzugs sam/ glang gi gzugs kyi 'khrul 'khor zhig sbyar na/ de don gang gi slad du bgyis pa'i don de sgrub kyang 'khrul 'khor de ni rnam par
393b4('bum): mi rtog go / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang don gang gi slad du brjod pa'i don de bgyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni rnam par mi rtog
393b5('bum): pa'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig rnam par
393b6('bum): mi rtog pa yin nam/ 'on te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin/ 'on te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin/ 'on te bzod
393b7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin/ 'on te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin/ 'on te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi
394a1('bum): rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi
394a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol
394a3('bum): tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci gzugs kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ 'du shes kyang
394a4('bum): rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ 'du byed kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ mig kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rna ba'ang
394a5('bum): rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ sna'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ lce'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ lus kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ yid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa
394a6('bum): yin nam/ gzugs kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ sgra'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ dri'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ ro'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ reg kyang
394a7('bum): rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ chos kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog
394b1('bum): pa yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin
394b2('bum): nam| yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/
394b3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus
394b4('bum): te reg pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par
394b5('bum): mi rtog pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ lus kyi
394b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ sa'i khams kyang rnam par mi
394b7('bum): rtog pa yin nam/ chu'i khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ me'i khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rlung gi khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams
395a1('bum): kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ ma rig pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ 'du byed
395a2('bum): kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ ming dang gzugs kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ skye mched drug kyang rnam par mi rtog
395a3('bum): pa yin nam/ reg pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ sred pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ len pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa
395a4('bum): yin nam/ srid pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ skye ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rga shi'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam
395a5('bum): par mi rtog pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
395a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi
395a7('bum): rtog pa yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/
395b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ 'dus byas
395b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ thog
395b3('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa
395b4('bum): yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi
395b5('bum): rtog pa yin nam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
395b6('bum): kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul
395b7('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ dbang po rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ stobs rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan
396a1('bum): lag rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden
396a2('bum): pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ bsam gtan rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ tshad med pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ gzugs med
396a3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
396a4('bum): pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ mngon par
396a5('bum): shes pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ de
396a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang
396a7('bum): rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ byams pa chen po'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
396b1('bum): kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ phyir
396b2('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rang byang chub kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ lam gyi rnam
396b3('bum): pa shes pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/
396b4('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /smras pa/ tshe
396b5('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gal te de ltar chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa yin na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha
396b6('bum): dang | mi'i 'gro ba lngar 'khor ba zhes tha dad du dbye ba ci las 'ongs/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs
396b7('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su brjod pa'ang ci las gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ /sems can gang
397a1('bum): phyin ci log las byung ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa de dag 'di lta bu'i skye mched mngon par sgrub ste/ las kyi rnam par smin
397a2('bum): pa phung po'i gzhi can rnam par rtog pa las byung ba yongs su bzung zhing sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang / mi'i
397a3('bum): 'gro ba mngon par sgrub bo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ rgyun du zhugs par brjod pa ci las gyur/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar brjod pa ci las
397a4('bum): gyur| phyir mi 'ong bar brjod pa ci las gyur/ dgra bcom par brjod pa ci las gyur/ rang sangs rgyas su brjod pa ci las gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' brjod pa ci las
397a5('bum): gyur| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su brjod pa ci las gyur ces zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par mi rtog
397a6('bum): pa las rgyun du zhugs par brjod do/ /rnam par mi rtog pa las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur brjod do/ /rnam par mi rtog pa las lan cig phyir 'ong bar brjod do/ /
397a7('bum): rnam par mi rtog pa las lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur brjod do/ /rnam par mi rtog pa las phyir mi 'ong bar brjod do/ /rnam par mi rtog pa las phyir mi 'ong ba'i
397b1('bum): 'bras bur brjod do/ /rnam par mi rtog pa las dgra bcom par brjod do/ /rnam par mi rtog pa las dgra bcom pa nyid du brjod do/ /rnam par mi rtog pa las rang sangs rgyas su
397b2('bum): brjod do/ /rnam par mi rtog pa las rang byang chub tu brjod do/ /rnam par mi rtog pa las sangs rgyas su brjod do/ /rnam par mi rtog pa las byang chub tu brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
397b3('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
397b4('bum): kyang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa spangs par gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
397b5('bum): p ar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa spangs par 'gyur
397b6('bum): ro| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bla na med pa yang dag par
397b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa spangs pa sha stag go/ de ltar tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
398a1('bum): /rnam grangs des/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin
398a2('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid la brtson par byas te/ rnam par rtog pa med par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
398a3('bum): chen pos de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya ste/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos
398a4('bum): thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
398a5('bum): ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye ma tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
398a6('bum): pa la spyod pa ni snying po la spyod pa'o/ /de skad ces smras pa/ dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye ma tshe dang ldan pa shA
398a7('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni snying po med pa la spyod pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
398b1('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o/ /
398b2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o/ /spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid ni snying po med
398b3('bum): pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /don dam pa
398b4('bum): stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /thog
398b5('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni snying po
398b6('bum): med pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa
398b7('bum): nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /yang dag par spong pa rnams ni snying
399a1('bum): po med pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /dbang po rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /stobs rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /byang chub kyi
399a2('bum): yan lag rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni snying po med pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams ni
399a3('bum): snying po med pa'o/ /tshad med pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /
399a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni snying po med pa'o/ /
399a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
399a6('bum): ni snying po med pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /byams pa chen po ni snying po med pa'o/ /snying rje chen po
399a7('bum): ni snying po med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o/ /thams cad shes pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni snying po med
399b1('bum): pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
399b2('bum): pas ni snying po med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ snying po la dmigs pa lta ga la yod/ de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod
399b3('bum): pa'i lha'i bu shin tu mang ba dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / gang
399b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa dang / don 'di la spyod kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' gang mngon du byas pas nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
399b5('bum): rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya ba de dag ni phyag bya ba'i gnas te/ rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
399b6('bum): chos kyi mnyam pa nyid 'di mngon par mi byed pa de dag ni phyag bya bar 'os pa'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu dag
399b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la ni/ chos kyi mnyam pa nyid gang mngon du bya bas nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de
400a1('bum): mngon du mi bya ba de ni mi dka'i/ lha'i bu dag /sems can tshad med/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes
400a2('bum): go cha bgos la/ gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i sems can de dag shin tu mi dmigs pa ni de dag la de bas dka' ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
400a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad gdul bar bya'o zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa yin te/ gang sems can
400a4('bum): gdul bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' gdul bar sems pa dang 'dra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' dben pa'i phyir sems can dben par blta'o/ /nam mkha' stong pa
400a5('bum): nyid kyi phyir sems can stong pa nyid du blta'o/ /nam mkha' snying po med pa'i phyir sems can snying po med par blta'o/ /nam mkha' gsog gi phyir sems can gsog tu
400a6('bum): blta'o/ /lha'i bu dag/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can med pa rnams kyi don du go cha gyon pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa ste/
400a7('bum): gang sems can rnams kyi don du go cha gyon pa de dag ni nam mkha' dang brtsad par 'dod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha de'ang bgos la/
400b1('bum): sems can gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dben pa'i phyir go
400b2('bum): cha dben par blta'o/ /gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhum par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
400b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /'du shes dben pa'i
400b4('bum): phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /mig dben pa'i phyir sems can
400b5('bum): dben pa'o/ /rna ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sna dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lce dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lus dben pa'i phyir
400b6('bum): sems can dben pa'o/ /yid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sgra dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /
400b7('bum): dri dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /ro dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /reg dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /chos dben pa'i phyir sems can dben
401a1('bum): pa'o| |mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sna'i rnam
401a2('bum): par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben
401a3('bum): pa'o| |yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir
401a4('bum): sems can dben pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
401a5('bum): dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can
401a6('bum): dben pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben
401a7('bum): pa'o| |lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /
401b1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can
401b2('bum): dben pa'o/ /me'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /
401b3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rnam par
401b4('bum): shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /reg pa dben
401b5('bum): pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sred pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /len pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /
401b6('bum): srid pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /skye ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rga shi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben
401b7('bum): pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /
402a1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /
402a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can
402a3('bum): dben pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir
402a4('bum): sems can dben pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong
402a5('bum): pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir
402a6('bum): sems can dben pa'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /chos thams cad
402a7('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems
402b1('bum): can dben pa'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
402b2('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can
402b3('bum): dben pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /dbang po lnga dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /stobs lnga dben pa'i phyir sems can dben
402b4('bum): pa'o| |byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /'phags pa'i
402b5('bum): bden pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /tshad med pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /
402b6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ /bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
402b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa'i phyir sems can
403a1('bum): dben pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /
403a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dben pa'i
403a3('bum): phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /byams pa chen po dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /snying rje chen po
403a4('bum): dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir
403a5('bum): sems can dben pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /dgra
403a6('bum): bcom pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /rang byang chub dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben
403a7('bum): pa'o| |rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis
403b1('bum): brgya lnga bcu pa/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /'du shes dben
403b2('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
403b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /mig dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rna ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sna dben
403b4('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lce dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lus dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
403b5('bum): pa'o| |yid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sgra dben pa'i phyir shes rab
403b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /dri dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /ro dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /reg dben
403b7('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /chos dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
404a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes
404a2('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa
404a3('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa
404a4('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben
404a5('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben
404a6('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
404a7('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
404b1('bum): pa dben pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir
404b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las
404b3('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /chu'i khams dben pa'i
404b4('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /me'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
404b5('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
404b6('bum): phyin pa dben pa'o/ /ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rnam par
404b7('bum): shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /skye mched drug dben pa'i
405a1('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes
405a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sred pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /len pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /srid
405a3('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /skye ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rga shi dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
405a4('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
405a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes
405a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i
405a7('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
405b1('bum): phyin pa dben pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /
405b2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /'dus byas
405b3('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das
405b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /dor ba
405b5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /chos thams cad
405b6('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong
405b7('bum): pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa nyid
406a1('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
406a2('bum): dben pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
406a3('bum): pa'o| |rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /dbang po dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /stobs dben
406a4('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
406a5('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /bsam gtan dben pa'i
406a6('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /tshad med pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben
406a7('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
406b1('bum): 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
406b2('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /
406b3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /mi 'jigs
406b4('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /byams pa chen po dben pa'i
406b5('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir shes
406b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i
406b7('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab
407a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rang byang chub dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben
407a2('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ /lha'i bu dag /gal te
407a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dben par bshad pa la sems mi 'jum/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur la/ de'i yid 'jigs par mi
407a4('bum): 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
407a5('bum): skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ba yin/ gsol pa/
407a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad ma mchis pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /
407a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad dben pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma skyes pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
407b1('bum): zhum par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe
407b2('bum): na| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba dang / gang la zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ma mchis pa ste/
407b3('bum): dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de skad du bshad pa la mi 'jum mi 'gong zhing yid chad pa dang / sgyid
407b4('bum): lug par mi 'gyur la/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni
407b5('bum): 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur ba'am/ gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba'am/ gang / zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/
407b6('bum): de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dbang po dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis phyag bgyi bar
407b7('bum): 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni dbang po dang bcas/
408a1('bum): tshangs pa dang bcas/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis phyag bya bar yang ma zad de/ gang 'phags pa mngon par 'phags pa'i kha
408a2('bum): dog dang ldan pa dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems
408a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la phyag bya bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
408a4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med tshad med pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
408a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa de la dgongs pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
408a6('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /brtson
408a7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
408b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
408b2('bum): byed pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
408b3('bum): byed pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
408b4('bum): par byed pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su
408b5('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /mi dmigs pa stong
408b6('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i
408b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul
409a1('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag
409a2('bum): bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /bsam
409a3('bum): gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed
409a4('bum): pa'o| |rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i
409a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin
409a6('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /mi
409a7('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /
409b1('bum): snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /
409b2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /
409b3('bum): rang byang chub yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o zhes
409b4('bum): dgongs pa mdzad do/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
409b5('bum): dgongs pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar zhugs par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten
409b6('bum): gyi khams dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig to can du gyur te/ bdud sdig to can de dag re res kyang de snyed kyi bdud sdig to can mngon par
409b7('bum): sprul kyang de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la bar chad bya bar mi nus so/ /rab 'byor/ chos gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
410a1('bum): dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ des chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar rnam par bltas pa
410a2('bum): yin/ des sems can thams cad kyang yongs su ma btang ba yin te/ rab 'byor/ chos 'di gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can
410a3('bum): rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis dang ldan pa bdud sdig
410a4('bum): to can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ shes
410a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de gnyis dang ldan pa ni/ bdud sdig to can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/
410a6('bum): de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du ni lha'i bu rnams kyang 'ong bar sems so/ /bsnyen bkur ba dang / yongs su dri ba dang / kun dri ba'ang byed
410a7('bum): par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur gyi/ de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa dang /
410b1('bum): mtshan ma med pas rnam par spyod pa dang / smon pa med pas rnam par spyod pa de nyid kyis rnam par spyod par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnam par spyod pa des/
410b2('bum): rnam par spyad pa dang / sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur ro/ /sems can skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ro/ /sems can dpung gnyen med pa
410b3('bum): rnams kyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur ro/ /sems can gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ro/ /sems can rten med pa rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ro/ /sems can gling med pa
410b4('bum): rnams kyi gling du 'gyur ro/ /sems can mun par gyur pa rnams kyi snang bar 'gyur ro zhes de la spro ba skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams
410b5('bum): tshad med grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor te bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de
410b6('bum): dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan de dag dang ldan
410b7('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i ming dang rigs yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mdzad de/ rab 'byor/
411a1('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nga da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal gyi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
411a2('bum): cing ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug phud kyi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa
411a3('bum): ched du brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab
411a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag gi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa bzhin no/ /shar phyogs kyi sangs
411a5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig
411a6('bum): tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad
411a7('bum): do| |lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
411b1('bum): po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa'ang ched du
411b2('bum): brjod pa mdzad do/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa'
411b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod
411b4('bum): pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems
411b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/
411b6('bum): ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa
411b7('bum): de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar
412a1('bum): mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
412a2('bum): 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad
412a3('bum): pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /lho
412a4('bum): nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems
412a5('bum): dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du
412a6('bum): brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag
412a7('bum): k yang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar
412b1('bum): mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba
412b2('bum): dang | chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de
412b3('bum): dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs
412b4('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
412b5('bum): phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
412b6('bum): dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
412b7('bum): 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
413a1('bum): chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don du zhugs pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs
413a2('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar ldog pa'am/ slar mi ldog pa'am gang gi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos
413a3('bum): ston pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
413a4('bum): spyod pa'ang yod/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung ma bstan pa las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang yod de/ de dag la sangs rgyas bcom
413a5('bum): ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
413a6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
413a7('bum): d ag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod pa de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul
413b1('bum): gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal gyi rjes su slob pa'i tshul
413b2('bum): g yis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad
413b3('bum): do| |rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad skye ba med par mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos
413b4('bum): la bzod pa ma thob pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad gsog/ gsob ste/ rag lus pa'o zhes bya ba dang /
413b5('bum): snying po med pa'o zhes bya bar mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod
413b6('bum): pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos
413b7('bum): ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa spangs pa yin te/ bla
414a1('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang lung bstan pa yin/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
414a2('bum): r ol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i
414a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te/ de la gnas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab
414a4('bum): 'byor| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa thos nas/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
414a5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin no zhes nem nur med cing the tshom mi za la rmongs par mi 'gyur na/ des ni phyis kyang rgya cher de bzhin gshegs
414a6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag las thos par 'gyur te/ byang chub
414a7('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas ji
414b1('bum): skad du bstan pa de bzhin du mos pas/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par gyur te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
414b2('bum): pa thos pa ni phan pa mang por 'gyur ba yin te/ gang gis mos shing mos nas de bzhin nyid du gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni lta smos kyang ci smos te/ de
414b3('bum): dag de bzhin nyid la gnas/ de bzhin nyid la nan tan du byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin nyid du
414b4('bum): gnas nas/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyis te/ chos gang yang mi dmigs na/ de ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/
414b5('bum): de ltar de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa'i chos kyang gang yang mi dmigs na su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag
414b6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / chos ston par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su ma
414b7('bum): mchis na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / da bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de
415a1('bum): bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gang
415a2('bum): khyod kyis 'di skad du gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
415a3('bum): ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa gzhan dmigs su med de/ de bzhin nyid kyang
415a4('bum): dmigs su med na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
415a5('bum): 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji
415a6('bum): skad du smras pa de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor/ gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
415a7('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs par gzhan dmigs su med
415b1('bum): de| de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med na/ gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
415b2('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs
415b3('bum): pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
415b4('bum): chos nyid de ni gnas pa'o/ /chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de
415b5('bum): bzhin nyid 'di la ni gang yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/ de la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba
415b6('bum): su'ang med na de la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
415b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
416a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos
416a2('bum): gang yang dmigs su ma mchis te/ su'ang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa ma mchis la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
416a3('bum): ba'ang gang yang ma mchis te/ chos ston pa'ang gang yang ma mchis la/ des zhum par yang mi 'gyur zhing de dag la nem nur du 'gyur ba'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba ma
