416a4('bum): mchis pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka/ gang khyod kyis 'di skad du bcom
416a5('bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos zab mo 'di dag la nem nur du mi 'gyur/ rmongs par mi 'gyur ba ni/ dka' ba bgyid pa'o zhes gsol
416a6('bum): pa ni/ kau shi ka /chos thams cad stong pa yin na/ de la nem nur du 'gyur ba'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba lta su zhig yod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor
416a7('bum): ni| gang ci ston kyang de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing ston te/ ci la'ang chags pa med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ bar snang la 'phangs pa'i mda' ni ci la'ang
416b1('bum): chags pa med do/ /de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos bstan pa'ang ci la'ang chags pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi
416b2('bum): bcu dgu pa'o/ / //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ bdag gis 'di
416b3('bum): skad du gsol te/ de skad du brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang / chos su brjod cing chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid yang dag par lung
416b4('bum): bstan pas lung bstan par 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /gang khyod kyis de skad du smras te/ de skad du brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas
416b5('bum): gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang / chos su brjod cing chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnas brtan rab 'byor
416b6('bum): 'dis ci dang ci spobs pa de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ smon pa ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ sbyin
416b7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ brtson 'grus
417a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
417a2('bum): brtsams shing spobs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ phyi stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
417a3('bum): brtsams shing spobs/ chen po stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ 'dus ma byas
417a4('bum): stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
417a5('bum): brtsams shing spobs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/
417a6('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
417a7('bum): pa nyid brtsams shing spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams brtsams shing spobs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams brtsams
417b1('bum): shing spobs/ dbang po rnams brtsams shing spobs/ stobs rnams brtsams shing spobs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams brtsams shing spobs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
417b2('bum): lag brgyad pa brtsams shing spobs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ bsam gtan rnams brtsams shing spobs/ tshad med pa rnams brtsams
417b3('bum): shing spobs/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ rnam par thar pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
417b4('bum): 'jug pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa brtsams shing spobs/ mngon par shes pa rnams brtsams
417b5('bum): shing spobs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams brtsams shing spobs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams brtsams shing spobs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams brtsams shing spobs/
417b6('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ byams pa chen po brtsams shing spobs/ snying rje chen po brtsams
417b7('bum): shing spobs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams brtsams shing spobs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
418a1('bum): bu brtsams shing spobs/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/ dgra bcom pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang byang chub brtsams
418a2('bum): shing spobs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brtsams shing spobs pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
418a3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /gnas brtan rab 'byor stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
418a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
418a5('bum): phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang brtson 'grus kyi pha
418a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ shes rab kyi
418a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang nang stong pa nyid la bsgom pa
418b1('bum): lta ci smos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang phyi stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta
418b2('bum): ci smos| stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang chen po stong pa nyid
418b3('bum): la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang
418b4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ mtha' las 'das
418b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang thog ma dang
418b6('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rang bzhin stong
418b7('bum): pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la
419a1('bum): bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ mi dmigs
419a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la
419a3('bum): bsgom pa lta ci smos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs
419a4('bum): na| gang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bsgom
419a5('bum): pa lta ci smos/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang mi dmigs
419a6('bum): na| gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ dbang po rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dbang po rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ stobs rnams kyang mi dmigs
419a7('bum): na/ gang stobs rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 'phags
419b1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang mi dmigs na/ gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang 'phags
419b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ bsam gtan rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang bsam gtan rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ tshad med pa rnams kyang mi dmigs
419b3('bum): na| gang tshad med pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
419b4('bum): rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rnam par thar pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
419b5('bum): pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
419b6('bum): dang / smon pa med pa'ang mi dmigs na/ gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ mngon par shes pa
419b7('bum): rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mngon par shes pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsgom pa lta ci
420a1('bum): smos/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
420a2('bum): kyang mi dmigs na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mi 'jigs pa
420a3('bum): rnams mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos/
420a4('bum): byams pa chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang byams pa chen po la rnam par spyod pa lta ci smos/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang snying rje chen po la rnam
420a5('bum): par spyod pa lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang mi dmigs na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par bsgrub pa lta ci smos/
420a6('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang
420a7('bum): mi dmigs na/ gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
420b1('bum): rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ rang byang chub nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rang
420b2('bum): byang chub kyi 'bras bu rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ rnam pa thams
420b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob pa lta ci smos/ de bzhin nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba
420b4('bum): lta ci smos/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang ma skyes pa mngon du byed pa lta ci smos/ mtshan rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang gi lus la mtshan yod par 'gyur ba lta ci
420b5('bum): smos| dpe byad rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang gi lus la dpe byad yod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /gnas brtan rab 'byor ni chos thams cad
420b6('bum): dben pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/ dmigs su med pa la rnam par spyod pa/ stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa la rnam par spyod pa/ smon pa med pa la rnam par spyod
420b7('bum): pa ste| kau shi ka/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod
421a1('bum): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /brgya phrag
421a2('bum): stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char
421a3('bum): yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi bzod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
421a4('bum): n a| de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa
421a5('bum): dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa'i rnam par spyod pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems
421a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid ni mchog ces bya'o/ /rab ces bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /
421a7('bum): bla na med pa/ gong na med pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /kau shi ka /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams
421b1('bum): cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar 'dod pas/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid kyis rnam par spyod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ shes
421b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la
421b3('bum): 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par
421b4('bum): byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su thob nas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i
421b5('bum): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
421b6('bum): stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya lnga gcig pa/ de nas 'khor de'i nang nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams ma tog mnad ra ba mang po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor
421b7('bum): to| |mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /dge slong brgya drug cu tsam yang stan las langs nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
422a1('bum): nas| bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge
422a2('bum): slong de dag gis thal mo sbyor te btud pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus snyim pa me tog mnad ra bas gang bar gyur nas/ me tog mnad ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
422a3('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /de ltar 'thor zhing mngon par 'thor ba dang / rab tu 'thor ba'i
422a4('bum): tshe| tshig 'di skad ces brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags pa'i rnam par spyod pa dam
422a5('bum): pas| bdag cag rnam par spyod par gyur cig ces smras pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag gis bsam pa thugs su chud de/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad
422a6('bum): do| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de ste/ de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'di lta ste/ 'od zer sngon
422a7('bum): po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rnam pa sna tshogs byung ste/ de dag gis stong gsum gyi
422b1('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang nas phyir 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
422b2('bum): kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
422b3('bum): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
422b4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
422b5('bum): ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dga' bo/ dge slong brgya drug cu po 'di dag bskal pa dpe skar ma lta bu la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
422b6('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ me tog sil ma zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sha stag 'jig rten du
422b7('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo me tog sil ma zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun mtshungs
423a1('bum): par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtshungs par 'gyur/ tshe'i tshad kyang 'di lta ste/ lo stong du mtshungs par 'gyur te/ de dag gang dang gang nas
423a2('bum): mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / mngon par byung nas rab tu 'byung ba dang / rab tu byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
423a3('bum): 'tshang rgya ba de dang de dag tu me tog kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
423a4('bum): dpa' chen po rnam par spyod pa'i dam pas rnam par spyod par 'dod pas/ shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
423a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pas rnam par spyad par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o/ /dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
423a6('bum): bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo des 'di ltar bdag ni mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa'am/
423a7('bum): dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa ste/ mi'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos pa'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su
423b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rgya cher thos pa'o zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o/ /dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes
423b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gzigs par bltas te/ dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes
423b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gang zag
423b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston cing rjes su 'doms pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des/ bdag
423b5('bum): gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par gyur/ bzung ba dang / bcangs
423b6('bum): pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la 'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba mang
423b7('bum): po bskyed par gyur to zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya ste/ dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des bdag gis ni nyan thos rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed/ nyan
424a1('bum): thos rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pa ma yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o/ /dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am
424a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / don dang / chos dang / yi ge
424a3('bum): dang mthun par khong du chud par byed na/ dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des bdag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
424a4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas mngon du gyur to zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o/ /dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
424a5('bum): mo 'di bstan pa thos na/ phyir mi ldog cing ngan du mi brjod la thos nas kyang mos pa thob par 'gyur na/ dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni sngon gyi rgyal
424a6('bum): ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar rig par bya'o/ /dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
424a7('bum): la las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lta'ang mi slu ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs
424b1('bum): rgyas sam/ sangs rgyas su 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
424b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes
424b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen
424b4('bum): po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
424b5('bum): nyid la spyod pa dang / /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa
424b6('bum): nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
424b7('bum): spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
425a1('bum): pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / /'phags pa'i
425a2('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
425a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
425a4('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod
425a5('bum): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod
425a6('bum): pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
425a7('bum): la spyod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa
425b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pas shin tu rtogs par bya'o/ /shin tu rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul
425b2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
425b3('bum): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la
425b4('bum): spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha'
425b5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos
425b6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo
425b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang /
426a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod
426a2('bum): pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la
426a3('bum): spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
426a4('bum): la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la
426a5('bum): spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
426a6('bum): rnams la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la
426a7('bum): spyod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ de bas na
426b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di khyod la gtad de/ dga' bo/ gal te khyod kyis ngas chos gang ji snyed cig bshad pa las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gtogs par
426b2('bum): ngas chos bstan pa de dag thams cad bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas/ de'i 'og tu chud gsan te bor yang de tsam gyis dga' bo khyod la skyon du ngas mi rtsi'i/ dga' bo/ gal
426b3('bum): te khyod kyi sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas de'i 'og tu chud gsan tam/ bor bar 'gyur na des ni/ dga' bo khyod la ngas skyon du
426b4('bum): gzung ngo / /dga' bo/ de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid khyod la gtad kyi/ ci nas kyang gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / kun chub par
426b5('bum): bya ba dang / shin tu yid la gzung bar gyis shig /legs par yongs su zin pa dang / legs par kun chub pa dang / legs par bcang bar gyis shig/ yi ge dang / tshig dang /
426b6('bum): 'bru shin tu rdzogs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig legs par shin tu zin par bya'o/ /dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
426b7('bum): 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa des ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang
427a1('bum): chub bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa des ni
427a2('bum): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub mthun par yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ mngon du gyur
427a3('bum): par nga la gang me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur
427a4('bum): stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par
427a5('bum): bya'o| |shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung ste/ bcangs nas bklags shing kun chub par bya ste/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma
427a6('bum): dang | na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis rim gror bya/ bkur stir bya/ phu dud du bya/ mchod par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rim
427a7('bum): gro dang | bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas na/ des ni nga'ang mchod par 'gyur/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
427b1('bum): rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa la rim gro dang / dga' ba dang / mos pa bskyed pa des ni 'das pa dang /
427b2('bum): ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / dga' ba dang / mos pa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gal te khyod la nga sdug cing yid
427b3('bum): du 'ong la yongs su ma btang zhe na/ dga' bo/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yongs su mi gtang bar gyis shig /ci
427b4('bum): nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las tshig 'ga' yang khyod kyis chud ma zos par gyis shig / dga' bo/ ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di gtad pa
427b5('bum): las brtsams te/ khyod la shin tu mang du bstan pa'ang mdor na/ dga' bo/ khyod la nga ji ltar ston par gyur ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di khyod kyi ston pa
427b6('bum): yin gyis/ dga' bo/ de bas na ngas khyod la tshad med par gtad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su gtad de/ dga' bo/ de bas na ngas lha dang / mi dang / lha
427b7('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du brjod de/ sus sangs rgyas yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba dang / 'das pa
428a1('bum): dang | ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su ma btang ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung
428a2('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub yongs su ma btang ba des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su btang bar mi bya ste/ 'di ni nga'i gdams ngag
428a3('bum): go| dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'phel par byed pa dang / kun chub
428a4('bum): par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnam grangs du mas rgya cher 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang / rab tu ston
428a5('bum): pa dang / shes par byed pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
428a6('bum): mo de ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
428a7('bum): dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ dga' bo/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de
428b1('bum): b zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
428b2('bum): byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji
428b3('bum): snyed cig 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/
428b4('bum): da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
428b5('bum): gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
428b6('bum): phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo/ da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
428b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
429a1('bum): chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo/ da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs
429a2('bum): med dpag tu med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs
429a3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo/ da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ byang phyogs
429a4('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing
429a5('bum): 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga'
429a6('bum): bo| da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
429a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
429b1('bum): byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo/ da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu
429b2('bum): med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
429b3('bum): 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo/ da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi
429b4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho
429b5('bum): skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo/
429b6('bum): da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
429b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
430a1('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo/ da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med
430a2('bum): dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas
430a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo/ da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ steng gi phyogs
430a4('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho
430a5('bum): skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo / /dga' bo/
430a6('bum): de bas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
430a7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems
430b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma ste/ skyed par byed pa'o/ /dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa de dag thams cad ni bla na
430b2('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo/ de bas na khyod la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag yang dang yang du yongs su gtad do/ /rjes su gtad do/ /de
430b3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod de/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mdzod ni zad
430b4('bum): mi shes pa'i chos kyi mdzod do/ /dga' bo/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
430b5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mdzod 'di las chos ston to/ /dga' bo/
430b6('bum): 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la bslabs nas/ bla na
430b7('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos bstan to/ /dga' bo/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
431a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la bslabs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
431a2('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ chos kyang ston par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
431a3('bum): 'das rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyad cig yod pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/ /yongs su mya ngan
431a4('bum): las 'da'o/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo gal te khyod kyis gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la nyan thos kyi sa las brtsams te/ chos bstan pa'i chos bstan
431a5('bum): pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed par gyur kyang / da rung nyan thos khyod kyis
431a6('bum): nga'i nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par mi 'gyur gyi/ dga' bo/ gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig 'ga'
431a7('bum): zhig brjod de/ bstan kyang nyan thos khyod kyis nga dgyes par byas pa yin te/ nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ de ji snyam du sems/ chos bstan pa snga
431b1('bum): ma des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed par gyur na/ dgra bcom pa
431b2('bum): de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mang ngam/ gsol pa/
431b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ de bas gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang byang chub sems dpa'
431b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po la chung ngu na nyi ma gcig cig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na/ de'i bsod nams chos mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ nyin
431b5('bum): gcig lta zhog gi/ dga' bo/ gal te nyi ma phyed dam/ dga' bo/ nyi ma phyed lta zhog gi/ dga' bo gal te snga dro gcig gam/ dga' bo/ snga dro gcig lta zhog gi/ dga' bo/ gal te chu
431b6('bum): tshod gcig tsam mam/ dga' bo chu tshod gcig tsam lta zhog gi/ dga' bo/ gal te skad 'ga' yud 'ga' thang 'ga' zhig gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pas byang chub sems dpa'
431b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan na/ dga' bo/ de'i bsod nams ni chos mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
432a1('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang des zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ gal
432a2('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la chung ngu na nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma phyed dam/ snga dro gcig gam/ chu tshod gcig
432a3('bum): tsam mam/ skad 'ga' yud 'ga' thang 'ga' zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des nyan thos dang / rang
432a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zil gyis non par gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag
432a5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod la/ gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul zhing yang dag par
432a6('bum): dga' bar byed pa yin/ yang dag par spro bar byed pa yin/ yang dag par gzhog pa yin/ yang dag par 'god pa yin te/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
432a7('bum): de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / dbang
432b1('bum): po lnga la spyod pa dang / stobs lnga la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod
432b2('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /
432b3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
432b4('bum): la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / so so
432b5('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i
432b6('bum): 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa dang /
432b7('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par 'phel ba ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
433a1('bum): las yongs su nyams pa'i gnas med/ skabs med do/ de ni gnas ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das
433a2('bum): kyis 'khor bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po de ltar 'khod pa rnams kyi mdun du/ rdzu 'phrul
433a3('bum): m ngon par 'du mdzad pa gang mngon par 'du mdzad pas thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa 'khor rgya mtsho lta
433a4('bum): bu 'khrug pa med pa kun kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang
433a5('bum): shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam
433a6('bum): par grol ba/ sems can thams cad la dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa sha stag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag gis kun
433a7('bum): nas bskor cing mdun du bdar ba mthong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par
433b1('bum): 'du mdzad pa de phyir brtul bar gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de phyir brtul bar gyur nas/ 'khor bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
433b2('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'ang ma mthong / gang zag nyan thos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba de dag kyang ma mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
433b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i zhing yang ma mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun yang mig lam na mi snang bar gyur to/ /
433b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i phyir brtul ba mdzad pas/ de'i phyir de dag
433b5('bum): gis mi mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
433b6('bum): zhing dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun mthong
433b7('bum): ngam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang ma mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang ma mthong / dge slong gi dge 'dun de'ang ma mthong / byang chub sems
434a1('bum): dpa'i dge 'dun de'ang ma mthong ste/ mig lam du'ang mi gda'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ de bzhin du chos thams cad
434a2('bum): kyang mig lam du snang ba ma yin te/ chos la chos snang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi chos mi mthong / chos kyi chos mi shes so/ /dga' bo/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
434a3('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / nyan thos de dag dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de mig
434a4('bum): lam du snang bar ma gyur pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mig lam du snang ba ma yin te/ chos la chos snang bar mi 'gyur/ chos kyis chos mi mthong / chos kyis chos mi shes
434a5('bum): so| |dga' bo/ chos thams cad ni shes pa med pa/ mthong ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ bya ba la mthu med pa sha stag ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo/ chos thams cad ni nam
434a6('bum): mkha' ltar byed pa med pas byed pa med cing 'dzin pa med pa'o/ /dga' bo/ chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bu ste bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /dga' bo/ chos thams cad
434a7('bum): ni sems dang bral zhing rnam par bsgrubs pas so sor gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de/ snying po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med pa'o/ /de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
434b1('bum): dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ chos gang la 'ang mngon par chags pa med do/ /dga' bo/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
434b2('bum): chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi
434b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de ltar slob pa ni rab ces bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /mchog ces bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na med
434b4('bum): pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na med pa zhes bya'o/ /mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /'jig rten thams cad la phan pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la bde ba/
434b5('bum): mgon med pa rnams la mgon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba/ sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa ste/ de la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
434b6('bum): p a'i sangs rgyas rnams stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di phyag g.yas pas gyen du bteg cing phyir gzhog kyang sems can de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen
434b7('bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bteg go zhes bya ba dang / bzhag go zhes bya bar mi shes pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i sangs
435a1('bum): r gyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid la bslabs pas chos rnams la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pa bsgrub
435a2('bum): pa yin te/ dga' bo/ bslab pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i bslab pa thams cad kyi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab pa ni rab ces bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /mchog
435a3('bum): ces bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /phul zhes bya'o/ /gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na med pa zhes bya'o/ /gong na med pa zhes bya'o/ /mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /
435a4('bum): dga' bo/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad gzung ba'am/ mtha' btsal bar 'dod pa ni nam mkha' la tshad gzung ba dang / mtha' btsal par 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir
435a5('bum): zhe na| dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad med pa ste/ dga' bo/ ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshad du bstan pa med do/ /ming mang po dang / tshig mang po dang /
435a6('bum): 'bru mang po la ni tshad yod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni tshad med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshad ma mchis pa
435a7('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ mi zad pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshad med do/ /dga' bo/ dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
435b1('bum): phyin pa la tshad med do/ /dga' bo/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha
435b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las byung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par ma gyur to/ /dga' bo/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
435b3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las byung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par 'gyur ba med do/ /dga' bo/ da ltar
435b4('bum): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas
435b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las byung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
435b6('bum): zad par bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' zad par bya bar sems su zad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi
435b7('bum): zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi
436a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad
436a2('bum): zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad
436a3('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad
436a4('bum): zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma
436a5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /
436a6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad
436a7('bum): zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
436b1('bum): pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par slong ba rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /rdzu
436b2('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams ni ma zad mi zad/ /zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
436b3('bum): kyi yan lag rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni ma zad mi zad
436b4('bum): zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
436b5('bum): rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par
436b6('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par
436b7('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni ma zad mi
437a1('bum): zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad
437a2('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
437a3('bum): bu ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur
437a4('bum): ro| |dgra bcom pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /rang byang chub ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur
437a5('bum): ro| |rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma zad mi zad zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos de dag la ni skye ba'ang med na de dag zad par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de nas bcom ldan
437a6('bum): 'das kyis ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ zhal gyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos yongs su bkab nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga'
437a7('bum): bo| de ji snyam du sems/ lce'i dbang po 'di lta bu dang ldan pa log par smra ba'am/ gzhan du smra bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs
437b1('bum): pa| ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'khor bzhi la rgya cher ston cig /rjod cig /sgrogs shig /shod
437b2('bum): cig| khod cig/ rab tu khod cig /khrol cig /rnam par phye shig /gsal bar byos shig /yang dag par ston cig /dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las gang la
437b3('bum): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas bslab par bya ba dang / gang la ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du bslabs
437b4('bum): pas| rang rang gi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ dga' bo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni yi ge thams cad la 'jug pa'o/ /dga'
437b5('bum): bo| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bslab par bya ba'i gzungs thams cad kyi sgo yin te/ gzungs
437b6('bum): 'di 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni spobs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgo thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ shes rab kyi
437b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos mi zad pa'i mdzod pas bshad pa'o/ /dga' bo/
438a1('bum): de bas na khyod kyis yid ches pa dang / khong du chud par byas te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
438a2('bum): kun chub par byed pa ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'dzin pa yin te/ dga' bo khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
438a3('bum): tu phyin pa'i gzungs gang bzung bas chos thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzungs ngas bstan pa ni 'di yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
438a4('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u lnga bcu pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nyis brgya nga gnyis pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab
438a5('bum): 'byor 'di snyam du gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang zab/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub kyang zab na/ bdag
438a6('bum): gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la de dri'o snyam ste/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
438a7('bum): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi bas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha'i mi zad pa'i phyir shes rab
438b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
438b2('bum): gzugs mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab
438b3('bum): 'byor/ 'du shes mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'du byed mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par

442a1('bum): rab 'byor/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dbang po mi zad pas/
442a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ stobs mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi yan
442a3('bum): lag mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ lam mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
442a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gtan mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
442a5('bum): bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ tshad med pa mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi zad
442a6('bum): pas| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab
442a7('bum): 'byor/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
442b1('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ mngon par shes pa mi zad pas/ shes rab
442b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzungs kyi sgo mi zad
442b3('bum): pas| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /
442b4('bum): rab 'byor/ mi 'jigs pa mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
442b5('bum): pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byams pa chen po mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ snying rje chen po mi zad pas/
442b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
442b7('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
443a1('bum): pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab
443a2('bum): 'byor/ dgra bcom pa nyid mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rang byang chub mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
443a3('bum): bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
443a4('bum): mi zad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gzugs nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
443a5('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ tshor ba nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
443a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'du shes nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
443a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'du byed nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha

449a3('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gtan nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

449a5('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/
449a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/
449a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nam
449b1('bum): mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
449b2('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
449b3('bum): bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ mngon par shes pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
449b4('bum): bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
449b5('bum): bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzungs kyi sgo nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
449b6('bum): bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sto bas nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
449b7('bum): mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ mi 'jigs pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
450a1('bum): bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
450a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ / rab 'byor/ byams pa chen po nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
450a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ snying rje chen po nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
450a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
450a5('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems
450a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/
450a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nam mkha' ltar zad mi
450b1('bum): shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ dgra bcom pa nyid nam mkha' ltar zad mi
450b2('bum): shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rang byang chub nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes
450b3('bum): pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nam mkha' ltar
450b4('bum): zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nam
450b5('bum): mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang ma rig pa nam
450b6('bum): mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'du byed nam mkha' ltar
450b7('bum): zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa nam mkha' ltar zad
451a1('bum): mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ ming
451a2('bum): dang gzugs nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
451a3('bum): skye mched drug nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
451a4('bum): reg pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
451a5('bum): tshor ba nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
451a6('bum): sred pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
451a7('bum): len pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ srid
451b1('bum): pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ skye ba nam mkha'
451b2('bum): ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre
451b3('bum): sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
451b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /
451b5('bum): rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba dang / shin tu rnam par spang ba la rnam par lta ba ste/ gang de
451b6('bum): ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying po byang chub la 'dug pa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos te/ de ltar rten cing
451b7('bum): 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang la la nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas/ mngon par
452a1('bum): bsgrub pa 'dis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
452a2('bum): rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur te/ de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang
452a3('bum): phyir ldog pa de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya ba 'di la ma brten pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
452a4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pas mngon par bsgrubs pas/ ji ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par lta bar bya ba dang / mngon par
452a5('bum): bsgrub par bya ba mi shes pas phyir ldog go / rab 'byor/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa phyir ldog pa de dag thams cad ni/ thabs mkhas pa 'di la ma brten
452a6('bum): pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog go /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
452a7('bum): chub las phyir mi ldog pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog ste/ de
452b1('bum): ltar thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ nam mkha' ltar zad mi shes pa mngon par bsgrub pas/
452b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par blta bar bya/ mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung
452b3('bum): ba la rnam par lta bas ni/ chos gang yang rgyu med pa las byung bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chos gang yang rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chos gang yang 'gag
452b4('bum): par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chos gang yang bdag tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sems can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / srog tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
452b5('bum): 'gro bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gso bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / skyes bur yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gang zag tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shed can
452b6('bum): du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shed bdag tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byed pa por yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byed du 'jug pa por yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
452b7('bum): slong ba por yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / yongs su slong ba por yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / tshor ba por yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / tshor du 'jug pa por yang dag par
453a1('bum): rjes su mi mthong / shes pa por yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / lta ba bor yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
453a2('bum): mi rtag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / bde bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sdug bsngal bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / bdag tu yang dag par rjes su mi
453a3('bum): mthong / bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar shes rab
453a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa la rnam par blta bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gang gi tshe byang chub
453a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe/ gzugs rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag yod
453a6('bum): pa'am/ bdag med pa'am/ zhi ba'am/ ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag yod
453a7('bum): pa'am/ bdag med pa'am/ zhi ba'am/ ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /'du shes rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag
453b1('bum): yod pa 'am/ bdag med pa'am/ zhi ba'am/ ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /'du byed rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag
453b2('bum): yod pa'am/ bdag med pa'am/ zhi ba'am/ ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rnam par shes pa rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/
453b3('bum): bdag yod pa'am/ bdag med pa'am/ zhi ba 'am/ ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag
453b4('bum): yod pa 'am/ bdag med pa'am/ zhi ba'am/ ma zhi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /rna ba rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag
